SELECT cs.student_id, cs.semester, cs.course_id, c.course_name, cs.staff_id, t.name AS staff_name, c.credit, cl.class_time, -- 从 class 表中获取 class_time cs.normal_score, cs.test_score, cs.total_score, cs.GPA FROM course_selection cs JOIN course c ON cs.course_id = c.course_id JOIN teacher t ON cs.staff_id = t.staff_id JOIN class cl ON cs.course_id = cl.course_id AND cs.class_id = cl.class_id -- 确保课程和班级关联正确 WHERE cs.student_id = #{studentId} -- 筛选指定学生
AND cs.semester = #{semester} -- 根据传入的学期进行筛选

SELECT cs.student_id, cs.semester, cs.course_id, cs.staff_id, cl.class_time FROM course_selection cs JOIN class cl ON cs.course_id = cl.course_id AND cs.class_id = cl.class_id -- 确保课程和班级关联正确 WHERE cs.student_id = #{studentId} AND cs.semester = #{semester}
SELECT s.student_id, s.name, s.sex, s.date_of_birth, s.native_place, s.mobile_phone, d.dept_name FROM student s JOIN department d ON s.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE s.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT e.semester, t.name as staff_name, c.course_name, e.class_id, e.header, e.content, e.send_time FROM email e JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.course_id JOIN teacher t ON e.staff_id = t.staff_id WHERE e.student_ids LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{studentId}, ',%') OR e.student_ids LIKE CONCAT(#{studentId}, ',%') OR e.student_ids LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{studentId}) OR e.student_ids = #{studentId};
